name: a Couple of Questions
description:
A Couple of Questions is a Murder Mystery set entirely within an interrogation room. 

Bill Hamilton has been murdered: Whodunit? His jealous twin brother? His on-off girlfriend?YOU must interrogate them to find out.

This is essentially a 'minimalist adventure game': one room, no items. All you can do is observe, and ask. Can you crack the case?

HOW TO PLAY:
Navigate the menus to look at the evidence. Interrogate the suspects, but watch their reactions! They might not be in the mood to answer you.
